name: Quake: Halloween Jam 4
summary: Fourth Halloween Jam held on QuakeAddicted, a community project featuring eight levels + a start map in varying sizes and themes. Some of the maps use custom textures, e.g. Makkon and Alice. The pack runs on Arcane Dimensions 1.8 (included) and comes with various custom content like models, sounds, skyboxes, and music tracks. The map sources are included.
